Resources.StreamSummary: <para/> When this method's response is enumerated multiple parallel requests will be executed against the PRTG Server and yielded in the order they return.
Resources.SerialSummary: <para/> If <paramref name="serial"/> is false, when this method's response is enumerated multiple parallel requests will be executed against the PRTG Server and yielded in the order they return.<para/> Otherwise, requests will be serially executed as the response is enumerated.
Resources.StreamLogsDateTimeSummary: Streams logs between two time periods from a PRTG Server. If <paramref name="serial"/> is true, logs are guaranteed to be ordered from newest to oldest.
Resources.StreamLogsDateTimeObjectSummary: Streams logs between two time periods from a PRTG Server for a specified object. If <paramref name="serial"/> is true, logs are guaranteed to be ordered from newest to oldest.
Resources.StreamLogsRecordAgeSummary: Streams logs for a standard time period from a PRTG Server. If <paramref name="serial"/> is true, logs are guaranteed to be ordered from newest to oldest.
Resources.StreamLogsRecordAgeObjectSummary: Streams logs from a standard time period from a PRTG Server for a specified object. If <paramref name="serial"/> is true, logs are guaranteed to be ordered from newest to oldest.
Resources.SerialOnlySummary: When this method's response is enumerated, requests will be sent to PRTG as required in order to retrieve additional items.
Resources.StreamReturnDescription: A generator encapsulating a series of <see cref="Task"/> objects capable of streaming a response from a PRTG Server.
Resources.SerialReturnDescription: If <paramref name="serial"/> is false, a generator encapsulating a series of <see cref="Task"/> objects capable of streaming a response from a PRTG Server. Otherwise, an enumeration that when iterated retrieves the specified objects.
Resources.SerialOnlyReturnDescription: A generator encapsulating a series of requests capable of streaming a response from a PRTG Server.
Resources.SystemInfoSummary: <para/> System Information is automatically refreshed by PRTG once every 24 hours. Devices are not guaranteed to support all system information types.

CommonParameter.name: token
CommonParameter.description: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.

MethodDef.name: {Request}{Name}
MethodDef.Summary: Retrieves a {extendedDescription} with a specified ID from a PRTG Server.<para/> If the {description} does not exist or an ambiguous match is found, an <see cref="InvalidOperationException"/> is thrown.

Exception.description: The specified {description} does not exist or multiple {description}s were resolved with the specified ID.

MethodDef.ReturnDescription: The {description} with the specified ID.

Parameter.name: id
Parameter.description: The ID of the {description} to retrieve.

MethodDef.name: {Request}{Name}s
MethodDef.Summary: Retrieves all {extendedDescription}s from a PRTG Server.
MethodDef.ReturnDescription: A list of all {description}s on a PRTG Server.

Parameter.name: serial
Parameter.description: Specifies whether PrtgAPI should execute all requests one at a time rather than all at once.

MethodDef.name: {Request}{Name}s
MethodDef.Summary: Retrieves {extendedDescription}s from a PRTG Server based on the value of a certain property.
MethodDef.ReturnDescription: A list of {description}s that match the specified search criteria.

Parameter.name: property
Parameter.description: Property to search against.

Parameter.name: value
Parameter.description: Value to search for.

MethodDef.name: {Request}{Name}s
MethodDef.Summary: Retrieves {extendedDescription}s from a PRTG Server based on the value of a certain property.
MethodDef.ReturnDescription: A list of {description}s that match the specified search criteria.

Parameter.name: property
Parameter.description: Property to search against.

Parameter.name: @operator
Parameter.description: Operator to compare value and property value with.

Parameter.name: value
Parameter.description: Value to search for.

MethodDef.name: {Request}{Name}s
MethodDef.Summary: Retrieves {extendedDescription}s from a PRTG Server, filtering for objects based on one or more conditions.
MethodDef.ReturnDescription: A list of {description}s that match the specified search criteria.

Parameter.name: filters
Parameter.description: One or more filters used to limit search results.

MethodDef.name: Query{Name}s
MethodDef.Summary: Retrieves {name}s from a PRTG Server based on one or more <see cref="Queryable"/> expressions.
MethodDef.ReturnDescription: An <see cref="IQueryable{{type}}"/> to be wrapped by <see cref="Queryable"/> LINQ Expressions.

MethodDef.name: Query{Name}s
MethodDef.Summary: Retrieves {name}s from a PRTG Server based on one or more <see cref="Queryable"/> expressions, specifying whether to use strict parsing semantics.
MethodDef.ReturnDescription: An <see cref="IQueryable{{type}}"/> to be wrapped by <see cref="Queryable"/> LINQ Expressions.

Exception.description: An expression was specified that cannot be evaluated server side.

Parameter.name: strict
Parameter.description: Whether to use strict evaluation. If true, a <see cref="NotSupportedException"/> will be thrown\nif an expression is encountered that cannot be evaluated server side.<para/>If <paramref name="strict"/> is false,\nthe maximal supported expression will be executed server side, with any remaining expressions executed client side.

MethodDef.name: Query{Name}s
MethodDef.Summary: Retrieves {name}s from a PRTG Server based on one or more <see cref="Queryable"/> expressions, starting with an expression to filter {name}s according to a specified predicate.
MethodDef.ReturnDescription: An <see cref="IQueryable{{type}}"/> representing the result of filtering the {name}s.

Parameter.name: predicate
Parameter.description: The predicate to initially filter {name}s by.

MethodDef.name: Query{Name}s
MethodDef.Summary: Retrieves {name}s from a PRTG Server based on one or more <see cref="Queryable"/> expressions, starting with an expression to filter {name}s according to a specified predicate and specifying whether to use strict parsing semantics.
MethodDef.ReturnDescription: An <see cref="IQueryable{{type}}"/> representing the result of filtering the {name}s.

Exception.description: An expression was specified that cannot be evaluated server side.

Parameter.name: predicate
Parameter.description: The predicate to initially filter {name}s by.

Parameter.name: strict
Parameter.description: Whether to use strict evaluation. If true, a <see cref="NotSupportedException"/> will be thrown\nif an expression is encountered that cannot be evaluated server side.<para/>If <paramref name="strict"/> is false,\nthe maximal supported expression will be executed server side, with any remaining expressions executed client side.

MethodDef.name: {Request}{Name}s
MethodDef.Summary: Retrieves {extendedDescription}s from a PRTG Server using a custom set of parameters.
MethodDef.ReturnDescription: A list of {description}s that match the specified parameters.

Parameter.name: parameters
Parameter.description: A custom set of parameters used to retrieve PRTG {Name}s.

Parameter.name: serial
Parameter.description: Specifies whether PrtgAPI should execute all requests one at a time rather than all at once.

MethodDef.name: {Request}{Name}s
MethodDef.Summary: Retrieves logs between two time periods from a PRTG Server. Logs are ordered from newest to oldest.
MethodDef.ReturnDescription: All logs that meet the specified criteria.

Parameter.name: startDate
Parameter.description: Start date to retrieve logs from. If this value is null, logs will be retrieved from the current date and time.

Parameter.name: endDate
Parameter.description: End date to retrieve logs to. If this value is null, logs will be retrieved until the beginning of all logs.

Parameter.name: count
Parameter.description: Number of logs to retrieve. Depending on the number of logs stored in the system, specifying a high number may cause the request to timeout.
Parameter.streamDescription: Number of logs to retrieve. If this value is null, all logs will be retrieved within the specified timespan.

Parameter.name: serial
Parameter.description: Specifies whether PrtgAPI should execute all requests one at a time rather than all at once.

Parameter.name: status
Parameter.description: Log event types to retrieve records for. If no types are specified, all record types will be retrieved.

Call.name: {Request}{type}s
Call.args: new LogParameters(null, startDate, endDate, count, status)

Call.name: {Request}{type}s
Call.args: new LogParameters(null, startDate, endDate, count, status), serial

MethodDef.name: {Request}{Name}s
MethodDef.Summary: Retrieves logs between two time periods from a PRTG Server for a specified object. Logs are ordered from newest to oldest.
MethodDef.ReturnDescription: All logs that meet the specified criteria.

Parameter.name: objectId
Parameter.description: ID of the object to retrieve logs from. If this value is 0, logs will be retrieved from the root group.

Parameter.name: startDate
Parameter.description: Start date to retrieve logs from. If this value is null, logs will be retrieved from the current date and time.

Parameter.name: endDate
Parameter.description: End date to retrieve logs to. If this value is null, logs will be retrieved until the beginning of all logs.

Parameter.name: count
Parameter.description: Number of logs to retrieve. Depending on the number of logs stored in the system, specifying a high number may cause the request to timeout.
Parameter.streamDescription: Number of logs to retrieve. If this value is null, all logs will be retrieved within the specified timespan.

Parameter.name: serial
Parameter.description: Specifies whether PrtgAPI should execute all requests one at a time rather than all at once.

Parameter.name: status
Parameter.description: Log event types to retrieve records for. If no types are specified, all record types will be retrieved.

Call.name: {Request}{type}s
Call.args: new LogParameters(objectId, startDate, endDate, count, status)

Call.name: {Request}{type}s
Call.args: new LogParameters(objectId, startDate, endDate, count, status), serial

MethodDef.name: {Request}{Name}s
MethodDef.Summary: Retrieves logs for a standard time period from a PRTG Server. Logs are ordered from newest to oldest.
MethodDef.ReturnDescription: All logs that meet the specified criteria.

Parameter.name: recordAge
Parameter.description: Time period to retrieve logs from. Logs will be retrieved from the beginning of this period until the current date and time, ordered newest to oldest.

Parameter.name: count
Parameter.description: Number of logs to retrieve. Depending on the number of logs stored in the system, specifying a high number may cause the request to timeout.
Parameter.streamDescription: Number of logs to retrieve. If this value is null, all logs will be retrieved within the specified timespan.

Parameter.name: serial
Parameter.description: Specifies whether PrtgAPI should execute all requests one at a time rather than all at once.

Parameter.name: status
Parameter.description: Log event types to retrieve records for. If no types are specified, all record types will be retrieved.

Call.name: {Request}{type}s
Call.args: new LogParameters(null, recordAge, count, status), serial

MethodDef.name: {Request}{Name}s
MethodDef.Summary: Retrieves logs from a standard time period from a PRTG Server for a specified object. Logs are ordered from newest to oldest.
MethodDef.ReturnDescription: All logs that meet the specified criteria.

Parameter.name: objectId
Parameter.description: ID of the object to retrieve logs from. If this value is 0, logs will be retrieved from the root group.

Parameter.name: recordAge
Parameter.description: Time period to retrieve logs from. Logs will be retrieved from the beginning of this period until the current date and time, ordered newest to oldest.

Parameter.name: count
Parameter.description: Number of logs to retrieve. Depending on the number of logs stored in the system, specifying a high number may cause the request to timeout.
Parameter.streamDescription: Number of logs to retrieve. If this value is null, all logs will be retrieved within the specified timespan.

Parameter.name: serial
Parameter.description: Specifies whether PrtgAPI should execute all requests one at a time rather than all at once.

Parameter.name: status
Parameter.description: Log event types to retrieve records for. If no types are specified, all record types will be retrieved.

Call.name: {Request}{type}s
Call.args: new LogParameters(objectId, recordAge, count, status), serial

MethodDef.name: Query{Name}s
MethodDef.Summary: Retrieves logs from a PRTG Server based on one or more <see cref="Queryable"/> expressions.<para/> If a lower date range is not specified, logs will be retrieved between the upper range and the beginning of all logs. If an upper range is not specified, logs will be retrieved from the current date and time. If an Id is not specified, logs will be retrieved for all objects.

MethodDef.name: Query{Name}s
MethodDef.Summary: Retrieves logs from a PRTG Server based on one or more <see cref="Queryable"/> expressions using strict parsing semantics.<para/> If a lower date range is not specified, logs will be retrieved between the upper range and the beginning of all logs. If an upper range is not specified, logs will be retrieved from the current date and time. If an Id is not specified, logs will be retrieved for all objects.

MethodDef.name: Query{Name}s
MethodDef.Summary: Retrieves logs from a PRTG Server based on one or more <see cref="Queryable"/> expressions, starting with an expression to filter logs according to a specified predicate.<para/> If a lower date range is not specified in any predicate, logs will be retrieved between the upper range and the beginning of all logs. If an upper range is not specified, logs will be retrieved from the current date and time. If an Id is not specified, logs will be retrieved for all objects.

MethodDef.name: Query{Name}s
MethodDef.Summary: Retrieves logs from a PRTG Server based on one or more <see cref="Queryable"/> expressions, starting with an expression to filter logs according to a specified predicate and specifying whether to use strict parsing semantics.<para/> If a lower date range is not specified in any predicate, logs will be retrieved between the upper range and the beginning of all logs. If an upper range is not specified, logs will be retrieved from the current date and time. If an Id is not specified, logs will be retrieved for all objects.

MethodDef.name: Watch{Name}s
MethodDef.Summary: Continuously streams logs from a PRTG Server. This method will not end until you stop requesting items from it, <paramref name="progressCallback"/> returns false or the specified <see cref="CancellationToken"/> is cancelled.<para/> Logs are ordered from oldest to newest.
MethodDef.ReturnDescription: All logs that meet the specified criteria between the first log retrieved and when streaming is ended.

Parameter.name: status
Parameter.description: Log event types to retrieve records for. If no types are specified, all record types will be retrieved.

Parameter.name: interval
Parameter.description: Interval (in seconds) with which PrtgAPI should poll for new logs.

Parameter.name: progressCallback
Parameter.description: Callback used to indicate how many records have been retrieved and whether to abort retrieving records.\nCalled between each polling attempt. Takes the number of records retrieved so far as an argument. If this method returns false, streaming will abort.

Parameter.name: token
Parameter.description: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.

MethodDef.Body: new InfiniteLogGenerator(GetLogs, null, status, interval, progressCallback, token)

MethodDef.name: Watch{Name}s
MethodDef.Summary: Continuously streams logs for a specified object from a PRTG Server. This method will not end until you stop requesting items from it, <paramref name="progressCallback"/> returns false or the specified <see cref="CancellationToken"/> is cancelled.<para/> Logs are ordered from oldest to newest.
MethodDef.ReturnDescription: All logs that meet the specified criteria between the first log retrieved and when streaming is ended.

Parameter.name: objectOrId
Parameter.description: The object or ID of the object to retrieve logs for.

Parameter.name: status
Parameter.description: Log event types to retrieve records for. If no types are specified, all record types will be retrieved.

Parameter.name: interval
Parameter.description: Interval (in seconds) with which PrtgAPI should poll for new logs.

Parameter.name: progressCallback
Parameter.description: Callback used to indicate how many records have been retrieved and whether to abort retrieving records.\nCalled between each polling attempt. Takes the number of records retrieved so far as an argument. If this method returns false, streaming will abort.

Parameter.name: token
Parameter.description: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.

MethodDef.Body: new InfiniteLogGenerator(GetLogs, objectOrId.GetId(), status, interval, progressCallback, token)

MethodDef.name: {Request}{Name}
MethodDef.Summary: Retrieves a channel with a specified ID from a PRTG Server. If the channel does not exist or an ambiguous match is found, an <see cref="InvalidOperationException"/> is thrown.
MethodDef.ReturnDescription: The channel with the specified ID.

Exception.description: The specified channel does not exist or multiple channels were resolved with the specified ID.

Parameter.name: sensorOrId
Parameter.description: The sensor or ID of the sensor containing the channel.

Parameter.name: id
Parameter.description: The ID of the channel to retrieve.

MethodDef.name: {Request}{Name}
MethodDef.Summary: Retrieves a channel with a specified name from a PRTG Server. If the channel does not exist or an ambiguous match is found, an <see cref="InvalidOperationException"/> is thrown.
MethodDef.ReturnDescription: The channel with the specified name.

Exception.description: The specified channel does not exist or multiple channels were resolved with the specified name.

Parameter.name: sensorOrId
Parameter.description: The sensor or ID of the sensor containing the channel.

Parameter.name: name
Parameter.description: The name of the channel to retrieve.

MethodDef.name: {Request}{Name}s
MethodDef.Summary: Retrieves all channels of a sensor.
MethodDef.ReturnDescription: A list of channels on the specified sensor.

Parameter.name: sensorOrId
Parameter.description: The sensor or ID of the sensor to retrieve channels for.

MethodDef.name: {Request}{Name}s
MethodDef.Summary: Retrieves all channels of a sensor that match the specified name.
MethodDef.ReturnDescription: A list of channels on the specified sensor.

Parameter.name: sensorOrId
Parameter.description: The sensor or ID of the sensor to retrieve channels for.

Parameter.name: name
Parameter.description: The name of the channel to retrieve.

MethodDef.name: {Request}{Name}
MethodDef.Summary: Retrieves a {description} with a specified name from a PRTG Server. If the {description} does not exist or an ambiguous match is found, an <see cref="InvalidOperationException"/> is thrown.
MethodDef.ReturnDescription: The {description} with the specified name.

Exception.description: The specified {description} does not exist or multiple {description}s were resolved with the specified name.

Parameter.name: name
Parameter.description: The name of the {description} to retrieve.

MethodDef.name: {Request}{Name}s
MethodDef.Summary: Retrieves all notification triggers of a PRTG Object.
MethodDef.ReturnDescription: A list of notification triggers that apply to the specified object.

Parameter.name: objectOrId
Parameter.description: The object or ID of the object to retrieve triggers for.

MethodDef.name: {Request}{Name}Types
MethodDef.Summary: Retrieves all notification trigger types supported by a PRTG Object.
MethodDef.ReturnDescription: The trigger types supported by the object.

Parameter.name: objectOrId
Parameter.description: The object or ID of the object to retrieve supported trigger types for.

MethodDef.name: {Request}{Name}
MethodDef.Summary: Retrieves the historical values of a sensor's channels from within a specified time period.
MethodDef.ReturnDescription: Historical data for the specified sensor within the desired date range.

Parameter.name: sensorOrId
Parameter.description: The sensor or ID of the sensor to retrieve historical data for.

Parameter.name: average
Parameter.description:
The time span (in seconds) to average results up to. For example, a value of 300 shows the average of results every 5 minutes. If a value of 0
is used, PRTG will use the true interval of the sensor.<para/>
Note: due to limitations of the PRTG API, value lookup labels can only be retrieved when the average is 0, while downtime information
can only be retrieved when the average is not 0.

Parameter.name: startDate
Parameter.description: The start date and time to retrieve data from. If this value is null, records will be retrieved from the current date and time.

Parameter.name: endDate
Parameter.description: The end date and time to retrieve data to. If this value is null, records will be retrieved from one hour prior to <paramref name="startDate"/>.

Parameter.name: count
Parameter.description: Limit results to the specified number of items within the specified time period.

MethodDef.SyncBody:
var parameters = new SensorHistoryParameters(sensorOrId, average, startDate, endDate, count);
return .Item1;
MethodDef.AsyncBody:
var parameters = new SensorHistoryParameters(sensorOrId, average, startDate, endDate, count);
return ;
MethodDef.StreamBody:
var parameters = new SensorHistoryParameters(sensorOrId, average, startDate, endDate, null);
return ;

MethodDef.name: GetModificationHistory
MethodDef.Summary: Retrieves the setting/state modification history of a PRTG Object.
MethodDef.ReturnDescription: A list of all setting/state modifications to the specified object.

Parameter.name: objectOrId
Parameter.description: The object or ID of the object to retrieve historical records for.

MethodDef.name: GetStatus
MethodDef.Summary: Retrieves configuration, status and version details of the PRTG Server.
MethodDef.ReturnDescription: Status details of a PRTG Server.

MethodDef.name: GetSystemInfo
MethodDef.Summary: Retrieves System Information including hardware, software, process, service and user information for a specified device.
MethodDef.ReturnDescription: A complete summary of System Information known to PRTG for the specified device.

Parameter.name: deviceOrId
Parameter.description: The device or ID of the device to retrieve information for.

MethodDef.name: GetSystemInfo
MethodDef.Summary: Retrieves a specific type of system information for a specified device based on the resulting object type.
MethodDef.ReturnDescription: System Information known to PRTG for the specified information type for the specified device.

GenericArg.name: T
GenericArg.description: Type of System Information to retrieve.

Parameter.name: deviceOrId
Parameter.description: The device or ID of the device to retrieve information for.

MethodDef.name: GetSystemInfo
MethodDef.Summary: Retrieves a specific type of system information for a specified device based on a <see cref="SystemInfoType"/>.
MethodDef.ReturnDescription: System Information known to PRTG for the specified information type for the specified device.

Parameter.name: deviceOrId
Parameter.description: The device or ID of the device to retrieve information for.

Parameter.name: type
Parameter.description: Type of information to retrieve.

MethodDef.name: RefreshSystemInfo
MethodDef.Summary:
Refreshes one or more types of system information on a specified device.<para/>
If no types are specified, all information types will be refreshed.

Parameter.name: deviceOrId
Parameter.description: The device or ID of the device to refresh system information for.

Parameter.name: types
Parameter.description: Types to refresh. If no types are specified, all types will be refreshed.

MethodDef.name: GetTotalObjects
MethodDef.Summary: Calculates the total number of objects of a given type present on a PRTG Server.
MethodDef.ReturnDescription: The total number of objects of the given type.

Parameter.name: content
Parameter.description: The type of object to total.

MethodDef.name: GetTotalObjects
MethodDef.Summary: Calculates the total number of objects of a given type present on a PRTG Server that match one or more search criteria.
MethodDef.ReturnDescription: The total number of objects of the given type.

Parameter.name: content
Parameter.description: The type of object to total.

Parameter.name: filters
Parameter.description: One or more filters used to limit search results.

MethodDef.name: Get{type}Properties
MethodDef.Summary: Retrieves properties and settings of a PRTG {type}.<para/> If the current user does not have write access to the specified object, an <see cref="InvalidOperationException"/> will be thrown.

Exception.description: The specified {name} is read only. To retrieve properties from read only {name}s, use <see cref="GetObjectProperty(Either{IPrtgObject, int}, ObjectProperty)"/>.

MethodDef.ReturnDescription: All settings of the specified {name}.

Parameter.name: {name}
Parameter.description: The {name} or ID of the {name} to retrieve settings for.

MethodDef.name: {Request}{Name}
MethodDef.Summary: Retrieves an object of an unspecified type based on its object ID.<para/> If an object with the specified object ID does not exist or an ambiguous match is found, an <see cref="InvalidOperationException"/> exception is thrown.

Parameter.name: resolve
Parameter.description: Whether to resolve the resultant object to its most derived <see cref="PrtgObject"/> type. If the object type\nis not supported by PrtgAPI, the original <see cref="PrtgObject"/> is returned.

MethodDef.name: {Request}{type}s
MethodDef.Summary: Retrieves sensors from a PRTG Server of one or more statuses.
MethodDef.ReturnDescription: A list of {description}s that match the specified search criteria.

Parameter.name: statuses
Parameter.description: A list of {description} statuses to filter for.

MethodDef.name: GetSensorTypes
MethodDef.Summary: Retrieves descriptions of all sensor types that can be created under a specified object. Actual supported types may differ based on current PRTG settings.<para/> If the specified object does not support querying sensor types, this method returns null.
MethodDef.ReturnDescription: If the specified object supports querying sensor types, a list descriptions of sensor types supported by the specified object. Otherwise, null.

Parameter.name: objectId
Parameter.description: The ID of the object to retrieve supported types of.

MethodDef.name: GetSensorTotals
MethodDef.Summary: Retrieves the number of sensors of each sensor type in the system.
MethodDef.ReturnDescription: The total number of sensors of each <see cref="Status"/> type.

MethodDef.name: GetDeviceTemplates
MethodDef.Summary: Retrieves all auto-discovery device templates supported by the specified object.
MethodDef.ReturnDescription: A list of device templates supported by the specified object.

Parameter.name: deviceId
Parameter.description: The ID of the device to retrieve supported device templates of. In practice all devices should support the same device templates.

MethodDef.name: {Request}{Name}
MethodDef.Summary: Retrieves a monitoring schedule with a specified ID from a PRTG Server.<para/> If the schedule does not exist or an ambiguous match is found, an <see cref="InvalidOperationException"/> is thrown.

MethodDef.name: {Request}{Name}
MethodDef.Summary: Retrieves a monitoring schedule with a specified name from a PRTG Server.<para/> If the schedule does not exist or an ambiguous match is found, an <see cref="InvalidOperationException"/> is thrown.

MethodDef.name: {Request}{Name}s
MethodDef.ReturnDescription: A list of all monitoring schedules supported by a PRTG Server.

InlineMethodDef.name: GetTree
InlineMethodDef.Summary: Retrieves a <see cref="PrtgNode"/> tree for a specified object. If no object is specified, the Root node will be used.
InlineMethodDef.ReturnDescription: A <see cref="PrtgNode"/> encapsulating the specified <paramref name="value"/> and all its descendants.

Parameter.name: value
Parameter.description: The object at the root of the tree.

Parameter.name: options
Parameter.description: Specifies the types of descendants to include in the tree. If no value is specified, <see cref="TreeParseOption.Common" /> will be used.

Parameter.name: progressCallback
Parameter.description: A callback used to receive progress notifications.

InlineMethodDef.name: GetTree
InlineMethodDef.Summary: Retrieves a <see cref="PrtgNode"/> tree for a specified object or ID.
InlineMethodDef.ReturnDescription: A <see cref="PrtgNode"/> encapsulating the specified object and all its descendants.

Parameter.name: objectOrId
Parameter.description: The object or ID of the object at the root of the tree.

Parameter.name: options
Parameter.description: Specifies the types of descendants to include in the tree. If no value is specified, <see cref="TreeParseOption.Common" /> will be used.

Parameter.name: progressCallback
Parameter.description: A callback used to receive progress notifications.

InlineMethodDef.Body:
var builder = new TreeBuilder(this, options, progressCallback, TreeRequestType.{Request}, token);
return .ToStandaloneNode<PrtgNode>();

InlineMethodDef.name: GetTreeLazy
InlineMethodDef.Summary: Lazily retrieves a <see cref="PrtgNode"/> tree for a specified object. If no object is specified, the Root node will be used.<para/> Children of the root object will be retrieved on demand upon being accessed.
InlineMethodDef.ReturnDescription: A <see cref="PrtgNode"/> encapsulating the specified <paramref name="value"/> that lazily calculates its descendants.

Parameter.name: value
Parameter.description: The object at the root of the tree.

Parameter.name: options
Parameter.description: Specifies the types of descendants to include in the tree. If no value is specified, <see cref="TreeParseOption.Common" /> will be used.

Parameter.name: progressCallback
Parameter.description: A callback used to retrieve progress notifications when children are lazily resolved.

InlineMethodDef.name: GetTreeLazy
InlineMethodDef.Summary: Lazily retrieves a <see cref="PrtgNode"/> tree for a specified object or ID.<para/> Children of the root object will be retrieved on demand upon being accessed.
InlineMethodDef.ReturnDescription: A <see cref="PrtgNode"/> encapsulating the specified object that lazily calculates its descendants.

Parameter.name: objectOrId
Parameter.description: The object or ID of the object at the root of the tree.

Parameter.name: options
Parameter.description: Specifies the types of descendants to include in the tree. If no value is specified, <see cref="TreeParseOption.Common" /> will be used.

Parameter.name: progressCallback
Parameter.description: A callback used to retrieve progress notifications when children are lazily resolved.

InlineMethodDef.Body:
var builder = new TreeBuilder(this, options, progressCallback, TreeRequestType.{Request} | TreeRequestType.Lazy, token);
return .ToStandaloneNode<PrtgNode>();

InlineMethodDef.name: AddSensor
InlineMethodDef.Summary: Adds a new sensor to a PRTG device. Based on the specified sensor parameters, multiple new sensors may be created.
InlineMethodDef.ReturnDescription: If <paramref name="resolve"/> is true, all new sensors that were created from the sensor <paramref name="parameters"/>. Otherwise, null.

Parameter.name: deviceOrId
Parameter.description: The device or ID of the device the sensor will apply to.

Parameter.name: parameters
Parameter.description: A set of parameters describing the properties of the sensor to create.\nDepending on the type of sensor parameters specified, this may result in the creation of several new sensors.

Parameter.name: resolve
Parameter.description: Whether to resolve the new sensors to their resultant <see cref="Sensor"/> objects.\nIf this value is false, this method will return null.

Call.name: AddObject
Call.args: deviceOrId.ToPrtgObject(), parameters, {RequestLambda}(f, t) => {Alias:GetObjects}, resolve, allowMultiple: true

InlineMethodDef.name: AddDevice
InlineMethodDef.Summary: Adds a new device to a PRTG group or probe.
InlineMethodDef.ReturnDescription: If <paramref name="resolve"/> is true, the device that was created from this method's device parameters. Otherwise, null.

Parameter.name: parent
Parameter.description: The group or probe the device will apply to.

Parameter.name: name
Parameter.description: The name to use for the new device.

Parameter.name: host
Parameter.description: The hostname or IP Address PRTG should use to communicate with the device. If this value is null, the <paramref name="name"/> will be used.

Parameter.name: discoveryMode
Parameter.description: Whether an auto-discovery should be automatically performed after device creation.

Parameter.name: resolve
Parameter.description: Whether to resolve the new device to its resultant <see cref="Device"/> object.\nIf this value is false, this method will return null.

Call.name: AddDevice
Call.args: parent, new NewDeviceParameters(name, host) { AutoDiscoveryMode = discoveryMode }, resolve

InlineMethodDef.name: AddDevice
InlineMethodDef.Summary: Adds a new device to a PRTG group or probe with a complex set of parameters.
InlineMethodDef.ReturnDescription: If <paramref name="resolve"/> is true, the device that was created from this method's device <paramref name="parameters"/>. Otherwise, null.

Parameter.name: parent
Parameter.description: The group or probe the device will apply to.

Parameter.name: parameters
Parameter.description: A set of parameters describing the properties of the device to create.

Parameter.name: resolve
Parameter.description: Whether to resolve the new device to its resultant <see cref="Device"/> object.\nIf this value is false, this method will return null.

InlineMethodDef.name: AddGroup
InlineMethodDef.Summary: Adds a new group to a PRTG group or probe.
InlineMethodDef.ReturnDescription: If <paramref name="resolve"/> is true, the group that was created from this method's group parameters. Otherwise, null.

Parameter.name: parent
Parameter.description: The group or probe the new group will apply to.

Parameter.name: name
Parameter.description: The name to use for the new group.

Parameter.name: resolve
Parameter.description: Whether to resolve the new group to its resultant <see cref="Group"/> object.\nIf this value is false, this method will return null.

InlineMethodDef.name: AddGroup
InlineMethodDef.Summary: Adds a new group to a PRTG group or probe with a complex set of parameters.
InlineMethodDef.ReturnDescription: If <paramref name="resolve"/> is true, the group that was created from this method's group <paramref name="parameters"/>. Otherwise, null.

Parameter.name: parent
Parameter.description: The group or probe the new group will apply to.

Parameter.name: parameters
Parameter.description: A set of parameters describing the properties of the group to create.

Parameter.name: resolve
Parameter.description: Whether to resolve the new group to its resultant <see cref="Group"/> object.\nIf this value is false, this method will return null.

InlineMethodDef.name: GetDynamicSensorParameters
InlineMethodDef.Summary: Creates a set of dynamic sensor parameters for creating a new sensor of a specified type.
InlineMethodDef.ReturnDescription: A dynamic set of sensor parameters that store the the parameters required to create a sensor of a specified type.

Exception.description: Sensor parameters failed to resolve within the specified timespan.

Parameter.name: deviceOrId
Parameter.description: The device or ID of a device that supports the specified sensor type.

Parameter.name: sensorType
Parameter.description: The type of sensor to create sensor paramters for.

Parameter.name: progressCallback
Parameter.description: A callback function used to monitor the progress of the request. If this function returns false, the request is aborted and this method returns null.

Parameter.name: timeout
Parameter.description: Duration (in seconds) to wait for sensor parameters to resolve.

Parameter.name: queryParameters
Parameter.description: A <see cref="SensorQueryTarget"/>, <see cref="SensorQueryTargetParameters"/> or <see cref="SensorMultiQueryTargetParameters"/> value specifying the parameters that must be known prior to interrogating a sensor's dynamic parameters (such as the SNMP Library file to use or IPMI UserName and Password).

InlineMethodDef.name: AutoDiscover
InlineMethodDef.Summary: Automatically creates sensors under an object based on the object's (or it's children's) device type.

Parameter.name: objectOrId
Parameter.description: The object or ID of the object to run Auto-Discovery for (such as a device or group).

Parameter.name: templates
Parameter.description: An optional list of device templates to use for performing the auto-discovery.

InlineMethodDef.name: AcknowledgeSensor
InlineMethodDef.Summary: Marks a <see cref="Status.Down"/> sensor as <see cref="Status.DownAcknowledged"/>. If an acknowledged sensor returns to <see cref="Status.Up"/>, it will not be acknowledged when it goes down again.

Parameter.name: sensorOrId
Parameter.description: The sensor or ID of the sensor to acknowledge.

Parameter.name: duration
Parameter.description: Duration (in minutes) to acknowledge the sensor for. If null, sensor will be acknowledged indefinitely.

Parameter.name: message
Parameter.description: Message to display on the acknowledged sensor.

InlineMethodDef.name: AcknowledgeSensor
InlineMethodDef.Summary: Marks one or more <see cref="Status.Down"/> sensors as <see cref="Status.DownAcknowledged"/>. If an acknowledged sensor returns to <see cref="Status.Up"/>, it will not be acknowledged when it goes down again.

Parameter.name: sensorIds
Parameter.description: IDs of the sensors to acknowledge.

Parameter.name: duration
Parameter.description: Duration (in minutes) to acknowledge the sensors for. If null, sensors will be acknowledged indefinitely.

Parameter.name: message
Parameter.description: Message to display on the acknowledged sensors.

InlineMethodDef.name: PauseObject
InlineMethodDef.Summary: Pauses monitoring on a PRTG Object and all child objects.

Parameter.name: objectOrId
Parameter.description: The object or ID of the object to pause.

Parameter.name: duration
Parameter.description: Duration (in minutes) to pause the object for. If null, object will be paused indefinitely.

Parameter.name: message
Parameter.description: Message to display on the paused object.

InlineMethodDef.name: PauseObject
InlineMethodDef.Summary: Pauses monitoring on one or more PRTG Objects and all child objects.

Parameter.name: objectIds
Parameter.description: IDs of the objects to pause.

Parameter.name: duration
Parameter.description: Duration (in minutes) to pause the object for. If null, object will be paused indefinitely.

Parameter.name: message
Parameter.description: Message to display on the paused objects.

InlineMethodDef.name: ResumeObject
InlineMethodDef.Summary: Resumes monitoring on one or more PRTG Objects (including sensors, devices, groups and probes) from a Paused or Simulated Error state.

Parameter.name: objectIds
Parameter.description: IDs of the objects to resume.

InlineMethodDef.name: SimulateError
InlineMethodDef.Summary: Simulates a <see cref="Status.Down"/> state for one or more sensors.

Parameter.name: sensorIds
Parameter.description: IDs of the sensors to simulate an error for.

InlineMethodDef.name: AddNotificationTrigger
InlineMethodDef.Summary: Adds a notification trigger to an object specified by a set of trigger parameters.
InlineMethodDef.ReturnDescription: If <paramref name="resolve"/> is true, the trigger that was created from this method's trigger parameters. Otherwise, null.

Parameter.name: parameters
Parameter.description: A set of parameters describing the type of notification trigger to create and the object to apply it to.

Parameter.name: resolve
Parameter.description: Whether to resolve the new trigger to its resultant <see cref="NotificationTrigger"/> object.\nIf this value is false, this method will return null.

InlineMethodDef.name: SetNotificationTrigger
InlineMethodDef.Summary: Adds or edits a notification trigger on an object specified by a set of trigger parameters.

Parameter.name: parameters
Parameter.description: A set of parameters describing the type of notification trigger and how to manipulate it.

InlineMethodDef.name: RemoveNotificationTrigger
InlineMethodDef.Summary: Removes a notification trigger from an object.<para/> Triggers can only be removed from their parent objects, and cannot be removed from objects that have inherited them.

Exception.description: The <paramref name="trigger"/> was inherited from another object.

Parameter.name: trigger
Parameter.description: The notification trigger to remove.

InlineMethodDef.name: CloneObject
InlineMethodDef.Summary: Clones a sensor or group to another device or group.
InlineMethodDef.ReturnDescription: The ID of the object that was created.

Parameter.name: objectOrId
Parameter.description: The sensor or group to clone.

Parameter.name: cloneName
Parameter.description: The name that should be given to the cloned object.

Parameter.name: destinationObjectOrId
Parameter.description: If this is a sensor, the device or ID of the device to clone to. If this is a group, the object or ID of the group or probe to clone to.

InlineMethodDef.name: CloneObject
InlineMethodDef.Summary: Clones a device to another group or probe.
InlineMethodDef.ReturnDescription: The ID of the object that was created.

Parameter.name: deviceOrId
Parameter.description: The device or ID of the device to clone.

Parameter.name: cloneName
Parameter.description: The name that should be given to the cloned device.

Parameter.name: host
Parameter.description: The hostname or IP Address that should be assigned to the new device.

Parameter.name: destinationObjectOrId
Parameter.description: The group or probe the device should be cloned to.

InlineMethodDef.name: GetObjectPropertiesRaw
InlineMethodDef.Summary: Retrieves all raw properties and settings of a PRTG Object. Note: objects may have additional properties that cannot be retrieved via this method.
InlineMethodDef.ReturnDescription: A dictionary mapping all discoverable properties to raw values.

Parameter.name: objectOrId
Parameter.description: The object or ID of the object to retrieve settings and properties for.

Parameter.name: objectType
Parameter.description: The type of object to retrieve settings and properties for.

InlineMethodDef.name: GetObjectPropertiesRaw
InlineMethodDef.Summary: Retrieves all raw properties and settings of an unsupported object type. Note: objects may have additional properties that cannot be retrieved via this method.
InlineMethodDef.ReturnDescription: A dictionary mapping all discoverable properties to raw values.

Parameter.name: objectOrId
Parameter.description: The object or ID of the object to retrieve settings and properties for.

Parameter.name: objectType
Parameter.description: The type of object to retrieve settings and properties for.\nIf this value is null, PRTG will attempt to guess the object type based on the specified <paramref name="objectOrId"/>.

InlineMethodDef.name: GetObjectProperty
InlineMethodDef.Summary: Retrieves a type safe property from a PRTG Server.
InlineMethodDef.ReturnDescription: A type safe representation of the specified property.

Parameter.name: objectOrId
Parameter.description: The object or ID of the object to retrieve the property from.

Parameter.name: property
Parameter.description: The well known property to retrieve.

InlineMethodDef.name: GetObjectProperty
InlineMethodDef.Summary: Retrieves a type safe property from a PRTG Server, cast to its actual type. If the deserialized value is not of the type specified, an <see cref="InvalidCastException"/> will be thrown.
InlineMethodDef.ReturnDescription: A type safe representation of the specified property, cast to its actual type.

Exception.description: The deserialized value could not be cast to the specified type.

GenericArg.name: T
GenericArg.description: The type to cast the object to.

Parameter.name: objectOrId
Parameter.description: The object or ID of the object to retrieve the property from.

Parameter.name: property
Parameter.description: The well known property to retrieve.

InlineMethodDef.name: GetObjectPropertyRaw
InlineMethodDef.Summary:
Retrieves unsupported properties and settings of a PRTG Object.<para/>
If the specified property does not exist, a <see cref="PrtgRequestException"/> will be thrown, unless the PRTG Server is not in English, in which case "(Property not found)" will be returned in your server's native language.
InlineMethodDef.ReturnDescription: The raw value of the object's property.

Exception.description: The specified property does not exist and the PRTG Server's language is English.

Parameter.name: objectOrId
Parameter.description: The object or ID of the object whose property should be retrieved.

Parameter.name: property
Parameter.description: The property of the object to retrieve. This can be typically discovered by inspecting the "name" attribute of the properties' <input/> tag on the Settings page of PRTG.<para/>\nIf the properties name ends in an underscore, this must be included.

Parameter.name: text
Parameter.description: If true, displays option properties using their label names instead of their internal numeric values.

InlineMethodDef.name: GetObjectPropertyRaw
InlineMethodDef.Summary:
Retrieves unsupported properties and settings of a PRTG <see cref="ISubObject"/> such as Channels and Notification Triggers.<para/>
If the specified property does not exist, a <see cref="PrtgRequestException"/> will be thrown, unless the PRTG Server is not in English, in which case "(Property not found)" will be returned in your server's native language.
InlineMethodDef.ReturnDescription: The raw value of the sub object's property.

Exception.description: The specified property does not exist and the PRTG Server's language is English.

Parameter.name: objectOrId
Parameter.description: The object or ID of the object whose property should be retrieved.

Parameter.name: subId
Parameter.description: The ID of the sub object whose property should be retrieved.

Parameter.name: subType
Parameter.description: The type of sub object to retrieve the property from.

Parameter.name: property
Parameter.description: The property of the object to retrieve. This can be typically discovered by inspecting the "name" attribute of the properties' <input/> tag on the Settings page of PRTG.<para/>\nIf the properties name ends in an underscore, this must be included.

Parameter.name: text
Parameter.description: If true, displays option properties using their label names instead of their internal numeric values.

Call.name: GetObjectPropertyRawInternal
Call.args: new GetObjectPropertyRawParameters(objectOrId, subId, subType, property, text), property

InlineMethodDef.name: SetObjectProperty
InlineMethodDef.Summary: Modifies properties and settings of a PRTG Object.<para/> Each <see cref="ObjectProperty"/> corresponds with a Property of a type derived from <see cref="ObjectSettings"/>.<para/> If PrtgAPI cannot convert the specified value to the type required by the property, PrtgAPI will throw an exception indicating the type that was expected.

Parameter.name: objectOrId
Parameter.description: The object or ID of the object whose properties should be modified.

Parameter.name: property
Parameter.description: The property of the object to modify.

Parameter.name: value
Parameter.description: The value to set the object's property to.

InlineMethodDef.name: SetObjectProperty
InlineMethodDef.Summary: Modifies properties and settings of one or more PRTG Objects.<para/> Each <see cref="ObjectProperty"/> corresponds with a Property of a type derived from <see cref="ObjectSettings"/>.<para/> If PrtgAPI cannot convert the specified value to the type required by the property, PrtgAPI will throw an exception indicating the type that was expected.

Parameter.name: objectIds
Parameter.description: The IDs of the objects whose properties should be modified.

Parameter.name: property
Parameter.description: The property of each object to modify.

Parameter.name: value
Parameter.description: The value to set each object's property to.

InlineMethodDef.name: SetObjectProperty
InlineMethodDef.Summary: Modifies multiple properties of a PRTG Object.<para/> Each <see cref="ObjectProperty"/> corresponds with a Property of a type derived from <see cref="ObjectSettings"/>.<para/> If PrtgAPI cannot convert the specified value to the type required by the property, PrtgAPI will throw an exception indicating the type that was expected.

Parameter.name: objectOrId
Parameter.description: The object or ID of the object whose properties should be modified.

Parameter.name: parameters
Parameter.description: A set of parameters describing the properties and their values to process.

InlineMethodDef.name: SetObjectProperty
InlineMethodDef.Summary: Modifies multiple properties of one or more PRTG Objects.<para/> Each <see cref="ObjectProperty"/> corresponds with a Property of a type derived from <see cref="ObjectSettings"/>.<para/> If PrtgAPI cannot convert the specified value to the type required by the property, PrtgAPI will throw an exception indicating the type that was expected.

Parameter.name: objectIds
Parameter.description: The IDs of the objects whose properties should be modified.

Parameter.name: parameters
Parameter.description: A set of parameters describing the properties and their values to process.

InlineMethodDef.name: SetChannelProperty
InlineMethodDef.Summary: Modifies a property of a PRTG Channel.

Parameter.name: channel
Parameter.description: The channel to modify.

Parameter.name: property
Parameter.description: The property whose value should be modified.

Parameter.name: value
Parameter.description: The value to set the property to.

InlineMethodDef.name: SetChannelProperty
InlineMethodDef.Summary: Modifies a property of one or more PRTG Channels.

Parameter.name: channels
Parameter.description: The channels to modify.

Parameter.name: property
Parameter.description: The property of each channel to modify.

Parameter.name: value
Parameter.description: The value to set each channel's property to.

InlineMethodDef.name: SetChannelProperty
InlineMethodDef.Summary: Modifies one or more properties of a PRTG Channel.

Parameter.name: channel
Parameter.description: The channel to modify.

Parameter.name: parameters
Parameter.description: A set of parameters describing the properties and their values to process.

InlineMethodDef.name: SetChannelProperty
InlineMethodDef.Summary: Modifies multiple properties of one or more PRTG Channels.

Parameter.name: channels
Parameter.description: The channels to modify.

Parameter.name: parameters
Parameter.description: A set of parameters describing the properties and their values to process.

InlineMethodDef.name: SetChannelProperty
InlineMethodDef.Summary: Modifies a property of a PRTG Channel based on its Sensor ID and Channel ID.

Parameter.name: sensorOrId
Parameter.description: The sensor or ID of the sensor whose channels should be modified.

Parameter.name: channelId
Parameter.description: The ID of the channel to modify.

Parameter.name: property
Parameter.description: The property of the channel to modify.

Parameter.name: value
Parameter.description: The value to set the channel's property to.

InlineMethodDef.name: SetChannelProperty
InlineMethodDef.Summary: Modifies a property of PRTG Channels with a given Channel ID across one or more PRTG Sensors.

Parameter.name: sensorIds
Parameter.description: The IDs of the sensors whose channels should be modified.

Parameter.name: channelId
Parameter.description: The ID of the channel of each sensor to modify.

Parameter.name: property
Parameter.description: The property of each channel to modify.

Parameter.name: value
Parameter.description: The value to set each channel's property to.

InlineMethodDef.name: SetChannelProperty
InlineMethodDef.Summary: Modifies one or more properties of a PRTG Channel based on its Sensor ID and Channel ID.

Parameter.name: sensorOrId
Parameter.description: The sensor or ID of the sensor whose channels should be modified.

Parameter.name: channelId
Parameter.description: The ID of the channel to modify.

Parameter.name: parameters
Parameter.description: A set of parameters describing the properties and their values to process.

InlineMethodDef.name: SetChannelProperty
InlineMethodDef.Summary: Modifies multiple properties of PRTG Channels with a given Channel ID across one or more PRTG Sensors.

Parameter.name: sensorIds
Parameter.description: The IDs of the sensors whose channels should be modified.

Parameter.name: channelId
Parameter.description: The ID of the channel of each sensor to modify.

Parameter.name: parameters
Parameter.description: A set of parameters describing the properties and their values to process.

InlineMethodDef.name: SetTriggerProperty
InlineMethodDef.Summary: Modifies a property of a PRTG Notification Trigger.

Parameter.name: trigger
Parameter.description: The notification trigger to modify.

Parameter.name: property
Parameter.description: The property whose value should be modified.

Parameter.name: value
Parameter.description: The value to set the property to.

InlineMethodDef.name: SetTriggerProperty
InlineMethodDef.Summary: Modifies a property of one or more PRTG Notification Triggers.

Parameter.name: triggers
Parameter.description: The notification triggers to modify.

Parameter.name: property
Parameter.description: The property of each trigger to modify.

Parameter.name: value
Parameter.description: The value to set each trigger's property to.

InlineMethodDef.name: SetTriggerProperty
InlineMethodDef.Summary: Modifies one or more properties of a PRTG Notification Trigger.

Parameter.name: trigger
Parameter.description: The notification trigger to modify.

Parameter.name: parameters
Parameter.description: A set of parameters describing the properties and their values to process.

InlineMethodDef.name: SetTriggerProperty
InlineMethodDef.Summary: Modifies multiple properties of one or more PRTG Notification Triggers.

Parameter.name: triggers
Parameter.description: The notification triggers to modify.

Parameter.name: parameters
Parameter.description: A set of parameters describing the properties and their values to process.

InlineMethodDef.name: SetTriggerProperty
InlineMethodDef.Summary: Modifies a property of a PRTG Notification Trigger based on its Object ID and Sub ID.

Parameter.name: objectOrId
Parameter.description: The object or ID of the object whose notification triggers should be modified.

Parameter.name: triggerId
Parameter.description: The Sub ID of the notification trigger to modify.

Parameter.name: property
Parameter.description: The property of the notification trigger to modify.

Parameter.name: value
Parameter.description: The value to set the notification trigger's property to.

InlineMethodDef.name: SetTriggerProperty
InlineMethodDef.Summary: Modifies one or more properties of a PRTG Notification Trigger based on its Object ID and Sub ID.

Parameter.name: objectOrId
Parameter.description: The object or ID of the object whose notification triggers should be modified.

Parameter.name: triggerId
Parameter.description: The ID of the notification trigger to modify.

Parameter.name: parameters
Parameter.description: A set of parameters describing the properties and their values to process.

InlineMethodDef.name: SetObjectPropertyRaw
InlineMethodDef.Summary: Modifies unsupported properties and settings of a PRTG Object.

Parameter.name: objectOrId
Parameter.description: The object or ID of the object whose properties should be modified.

Parameter.name: property
Parameter.description: The property of the object to modify. This can be typically discovered by inspecting the "name" attribute of the properties' <input/> tag on the Settings page of PRTG.<para/>\nIf the properties name ends in an underscore, this must be included.

Parameter.name: value
Parameter.description: The value to set the object's property to. For radio buttons and dropdown lists, this is the integer found in the 'value' attribute.

InlineMethodDef.name: SetObjectPropertyRaw
InlineMethodDef.Summary: Modifies unsupported properties and settings of one or more PRTG Objects.

Parameter.name: objectIds
Parameter.description: The IDs of the objects whose properties should be modified.

Parameter.name: property
Parameter.description: The property of each object to modify. This can be typically discovered by inspecting the "name" attribute of the properties' <input/> tag on the Settings page of PRTG.<para/>\nIf the properties name ends in an underscore, this must be included.

Parameter.name: value
Parameter.description: The value to set each object's property to. For radio buttons and dropdown lists, this is the integer found in the 'value' attribute.

InlineMethodDef.name: SetObjectPropertyRaw
InlineMethodDef.Summary: Modifies multiple unsupported properties of a PRTG Object.

Parameter.name: objectOrId
Parameter.description: The object or ID of the object whose properties should be modified.

Parameter.name: parameters
Parameter.description: A set of parameters describing the properties and their values to process.

InlineMethodDef.name: SetObjectPropertyRaw
InlineMethodDef.Summary: Modifies multiple unsupported properties of one or more PRTG Objects.

Parameter.name: objectIds
Parameter.description: The IDs of the objects whose properties should be modified.

Parameter.name: parameters
Parameter.description: A set of parameters describing the properties and their values to process.

InlineMethodDef.name: BackupConfigDatabase
InlineMethodDef.Summary: Requests PRTG generate a backup of the PRTG Configuration Database.<para/> When executed, this method will request PRTG store a backup of its configuration database under the Configuration Auto-Backups folder after first writing the current running configuration to disk.<para/> Depending on the size of your database, this may take several seconds to complete. Note that PRTG always creates its backup asynchronously; as such when this method returns the backup may not have fully completed.<para/> By default, configuration backups are stored under C:\ProgramData\Paessler\PRTG Network Monitor\Configuration Auto-Backups.

InlineMethodDef.name: ClearSystemCache
InlineMethodDef.Summary: Clears cached data used by PRTG, including map, graph and authentication caches. Note: clearing certain cache types may result in a restart of the PRTG Core Server. See each cache type for further details.

Parameter.name: cacheType
Parameter.description: The type of cache to clear. Note: clearing certain cache types may result in a restart of the PRTG Core Server.\nSee each cache type for further details.

InlineMethodDef.name: LoadConfigFiles
InlineMethodDef.Summary: Reloads config files including sensor lookups, device icons and report templates used by PRTG.

Parameter.name: fileType
Parameter.description: The type of files to reload.

InlineMethodDef.name: RestartProbe
InlineMethodDef.Summary: Restarts the PRTG Probe Service of a specified PRTG Probe.<para/> By default, PrtgAPI will wait 5 seconds between each probing attempt to confirm whether all probes have successfully restarted.<para/> If a progress callback is specified, it is up to the programmer to specify the wait duration between each request. If at any time the progress callback returns false, PrtgAPI will stop waiting for all probes to restart.

Parameter.name: probeOrId
Parameter.description: The probe or ID of the probe to restart.

Parameter.name: waitForRestart
Parameter.description: Whether to wait for the Probe Service on all probes to restart before completing this method.

Parameter.name: progressCallback
Parameter.description: A callback method to execute upon each request against PRTG to check whether all probes have restarted.

Parameter.name: token
Parameter.description: A cancellation token to use when waiting for all probes to restart. If cancellation is requested, this method will abort waiting for any remaining probes to restart.

InlineMethodDef.name: RestartProbe
InlineMethodDef.Summary: Restarts the PRTG Probe Service of one or more PRTG Probes. If no probe ID is specified, the PRTG Probe Service will be restarted on all PRTG Probes.<para/> By default, PrtgAPI will wait 5 seconds between each probing attempt to confirm whether all probes have successfully restarted.<para/> If a progress callback is specified, it is up to the programmer to specify the wait duration between each request. If at any time the progress callback returns false, PrtgAPI will stop waiting for all probes to restart.

Parameter.name: probeIds
Parameter.description: The IDs of the probe to restart. If this value is null or empty, the PRTG Probe Service of all probes will be restarted.

Parameter.name: waitForRestart
Parameter.description: Whether to wait for the Probe Service on all probes to restart before completing this method.

Parameter.name: progressCallback
Parameter.description: A callback method to execute upon each request against PRTG to check whether all probes have restarted.

Parameter.name: token
Parameter.description: A cancellation token to use when waiting for all probes to restart. If cancellation is requested, this method will abort waiting for any remaining probes to restart.

InlineMethodDef.name: RestartCore
InlineMethodDef.Summary: Restarts the PRTG Core Service. This will cause PRTG to disconnect all users and become completely unavailable while the service restarts.<para/> If PRTG is part of a cluster, only the server specified by the current <see cref="PrtgClient"/> will be restarted.<para/> By default, PrtgAPI will wait 5 seconds between each probing attempt to confirm whether PRTG has successfully restarted.<para/> If a progress callback is specified, it is up to the programmer to specify the wait duration between each request. If at any time the progress callback returns false, PrtgAPI will stop waiting for the core to restart.

Parameter.name: waitForRestart
Parameter.description: Whether wait for the Core Service to restart before completing this method.

Parameter.name: progressCallback
Parameter.description: A callback method to execute upon each request against PRTG to check whether PRTG has restarted.

Parameter.name: token
Parameter.description: A cancellation token to use when waiting for the Core Service to restart. If cancellation is requested, this method will abort waiting for the core to restart.

InlineMethodDef.name: ApproveProbe
InlineMethodDef.Summary: Approves or denies a newly installed probe for use within PRTG.

Exception.description: The specified object ID is not a probe or is a probe that has already been approved.

Parameter.name: probeOrId
Parameter.description: The probe or ID of the probe to set the approval status of.

Parameter.name: action
Parameter.description: The approval action to perform for the probe.

InlineMethodDef.name: RefreshObject
InlineMethodDef.Summary: Requests an object or any children of one or more objects refresh themselves immediately.

Parameter.name: objectIds
Parameter.description: The IDs of the Sensors and/or the IDs of the Probes, Groups or Devices whose child sensors should be refreshed.

InlineMethodDef.name: SetPosition
InlineMethodDef.Summary: Moves the position of an object up or down under its parent within the PRTG User Interface.

Parameter.name: objectOrId
Parameter.description: The object or ID of the object to reposition.

Parameter.name: position
Parameter.description: The direction to move in.

InlineMethodDef.name: SetPosition
InlineMethodDef.Summary: Sets the absolute position of an object under its parent within the PRTG User Interface.

Parameter.name: obj
Parameter.description: The object to reposition.

Parameter.name: position
Parameter.description: The position to move the object to. If this value is higher than the total number of objects under the parent node, the object will be moved to the last possible position.

InlineMethodDef.name: MoveObject
InlineMethodDef.Summary: Moves a device or group (excluding the root group) to another group or probe within PRTG.

Parameter.name: objectOrId
Parameter.description: The device or group to move.

Parameter.name: destination
Parameter.description: The group or probe to move the object to.

InlineMethodDef.name: SortAlphabetically
InlineMethodDef.Summary: Sorts the children of a device, group or probe alphabetically.

Parameter.name: objectOrId
Parameter.description: The object or ID of the object to sort.

InlineMethodDef.name: RemoveObject
InlineMethodDef.Summary: Permanently removes one or more objects such as a Sensor, Device, Group or Probe from PRTG. This cannot be undone.

Parameter.name: objectIds
Parameter.description: IDs of the objects to remove.

InlineMethodDef.name: RenameObject
InlineMethodDef.Summary: Renames an object such as a Sensor, Device, Group or Probe within PRTG.

Parameter.name: objectOrId
Parameter.description: The object or ID of the object to rename.

Parameter.name: name
Parameter.description: New name to give the object.

InlineMethodDef.name: RenameObject
InlineMethodDef.Summary: Renames one or more Sensors, Devices, Groups or Probes within PRTG.

Parameter.name: objectIds
Parameter.description: IDs of the objects to rename.

Parameter.name: name
Parameter.description: New name to give the objects.
